title: Hi
body: This is my blog. I'll post things here and make it look nice eventually.

title: Word Generator
body: A genetic algorithm that generates gibberish words

title: Snake AI
body:
This is a program that trains a neural network to play the Snake game. It's my first attempt at creating a neural network. It works semi-reliably, but it takes a long time to train.

YouTube video: https://youtu.be/4vr-2cWKyPI

title: mc2
body: A work-in-progress Minecraft clone (based on Three.js). Uses the New Start texture pack.

title: OS
body: An experimental operating system environment written in JavaScript.
